item.title: Cmstp UAC Bypass
item.description: Introduction While i was looking for a way to bypass UAC (User Account Control) i came across a LOLBIN (Living of the land binary) called cmstp.exe that can be abused to bypass UAC and execute arbitrary commands through an auto-elevated COM interface. Abusing CMSTP.EXE Running cmstp.exe with the following config will spwan an elevated cmd.exe. [version] Signature=$chicago$ [DefaultInstall] RunPreSetupCommands=RunPreSetupCommandsSection [RunPreSetupCommandsSection] C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe [Strings] ServiceName="EVIL" ShortSvcName="EVIL" Hurdle: User Options Box The issue is that the user must select All users option then click OK in order to spawn the elevated cmd.
